pr_title: Move assignments with init or record to a separate method

timeline.message:
Make the method size smaller for splitting init

The method size is made smaller for splitting the ___init_ function in the generated byte code. This would temporarily fix the method too large issue as in https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/23376

Make the method size smaller for splitting init

The method size is made smaller for splitting the ___init_ function in the generated byte code. This would temporarily fix the method too large issue as in https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/issues/23376

Disable test cases as in master

The tests disabled in master are disabled here as well: https://github.com/ballerina-platform/ballerina-lang/blob/12519554a6dd81b9fb0c53ef80a0560b48a0f941/tests/jballerina-integration-test/src/test/resources/testng.xml#L318-L326

timeline.bodyText: Are these packaging tests already failing in this 1.1.x branch? @hevayo @keizer619
timeline.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText: These tests fail when pulling or pushing to central.
replies.author: riyafa

replies.bodyText: @keizer619 @hevayo , is this expected with 1.1.x branch? Shall we go ahead with disabling the tests?
replies.author: Kishanthan

replies.bodyText:
This is ok as per @hevayo
"tests are failing probably due to lets encrypt migration of the staging server. And prior 1.2 clients are not compatible with that."
replies.author: Kishanthan

timeline.message:
Move assignments with init or record to a separate method

To prevent the method too large issue, this fix moves the assignment statements with init or record expressions to a separate method, thus making the init method smaller

Move assignments with init or record to a separate method

To prevent the method too large issue, this fix moves the assignment statements with init or record expressions to a separate method, thus making the init method smaller
